thread.title: Motorist alerts police to burning body in Long Island woods
thread.title_full: Motorist alerts police to burning body in Long Island woods - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Motorist alerts police to burning body in Long Island woods
text:
MANORVILLE, N.Y. (AP) - Police are investigating after the body of an unidentified person was found burning in a wooded area on Long Island by a passing driver.
Newsday reports ( http://nwsdy.li/1LRCRdR ) a motorist traveling down Wading River Manor Road notified Riverhead Police of a fire in the Otis Pike Preserve around 1:45 p.m. Thursday.
Riverhead Police Chief David Hegermiller says authorities initially weren't sure if the charred remains found belonged to a human or a mannequin.
Suffolk County Detective Lt. Kevin Beyrer says there is no identifiable information about the person yet.
The Manorville Fire Department was dispatched to the scene along with state police and a Suffolk police helicopter.
Officials say representatives from the state Department of Environmental Conservation were also present.
Information from: Newsday, http://www.newsday.com
